Posts.Content: snowprincess007 wrote: Hi All, I am 28 and have been diagnosed about 1 week ago.  Grade 1/2, 11mm BC.  Initially they thought I could just have a lumpectomy and was managing pretty okay until got results today from MRI which showed another satellite node/nodule of 8mm plus some additional dense tissue in the same breast.  Have further tests tomorrow (already sick of being poked at) to confirm but they are now talking about a mastecomy - very very scared.  Have surfed a couple of sites but you all seem to be the nicest so thought I would share my story.  Any words of wisdom greatly appreciated.  Oh and I live in Aust too so not sure if that changes things. Thanks Meg Dx 5/19/2009, IDC, 1cm, Stage IIB, Grade 2, 3/4 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 28 and just diagnosed snowprincess007 Kathy16
